statements: DELETE FROM customers WHERE age < 30 AND behavior_score > 50;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%John%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
DELETE FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE customer_id = 1 AND age > 30
DELETE FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age < 25)
DELETE FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE location = 'New York'
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_segment = 'VIP' AND behavior_score > 0.8
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM events WHERE event_type = 'Referral' AND event_date < '2022-03-15'
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1 AND preference_type = 'Special'
DELETE FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_id IN (SELECT behavior_id FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_date < '2022-01-01')
DELETE FROM customer_support WHERE strategy_id = (SELECT strategy_id FROM support_strategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Standard')
